scripts.docker-build: npm run build && docker build --platform=linux/amd64 -t bgrynblat/html2pdf:latest .
scripts.docker-dev: npm run docker-build && docker run --platform=linux/amd64 --rm -p 9000:8080 -v "$(pwd)/tmp:/tmp" bgrynblat/html2pdf:latest
scripts.docker-push: npm run docker-build && docker push bgrynblat/html2pdf:latest
